title: Generate a new UV Python Project.

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use?

templateDir.description: Custom template directory, this will override the default template, if not provided the default template will be used

pyenvPythonVersion.description: Pyenv .python-version content (default to current python version)

buildLockedVersions.description: Use locked versions for build dependencies

devDependenciesProject.description: This approach installs all the missing dev dependencies in a separate project (optional)

rootPyprojectDependencyGroup.description: If a shared pyproject.toml is used, which dependency group does this new project should belong to

unitTestHtmlReport.description: Generate html report for unit tests

unitTestJUnitReport.description: Generate junit report for unit tests

codeCoverageHtmlReport.description: Generate html report for code coverage

codeCoverageXmlReport.description: Generate Xml report for code coverage

tags.description: Add tags to the project (used for linting)

directory.description: A directory where the project is placed

projectNameAndRootFormat.description: Whether to generate the project name and root directory as provided (`as-provided`) or generate them composing their values and taking the configured layout into account (`derived`).
